name: Fiku
description:
Fiku is a puzzle-platformer game in which you play as an alien girl who lives in a meteorite that crashes into another meteorite.

You must go through levels to help her to reach the surface of the meteorite.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created in a weekend long GameJam, so it's still under development.

At the moment, three levels have been created, with more coming soon. The bugs are being fixed.
